All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddMoodEventDialogFragment
A dialog fragment that allows the user to add a new mood event.
AddMoodEventDialogFragment.OnMoodAddedListener
Interface for listening to mood event added events.

DatabaseManager
Manages interactions with Firebase Firestore for mood events.
DatabaseManagerTest
DatabaseManager Test Class (WITHOUT Mockito) Uses custom TestDatabaseManager class to verify method calls
DeleteConfirmationDialog
A dialog fragment that displays a delete confirmation message.
EmotionalState
Enum representing different emotional states with associated display names, colors, and emojis.
EmotionalStateAdapter
Adapter for displaying a list of emotional states in a RecyclerView.
EmotionalStateAdapter.OnEmotionalStateSelectedListener
Listener interface for handling emotional state selection.
EmotionalStateTest
 
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleModel
 
ExampleModelTest
 
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
FilterDialogFragment
A dialog fragment that displays filter options for mood events.
fragment_add_mood_page
A fragment that manages and displays a list of mood events.
fragment_friends_moods_page
A fragment that displays the moods of friends.
fragment_map_view_page
A fragment that displays a map view with mood event markers.
fragment_user_moods_page
Fragment to display the list of mood events for the logged-in user.
fragment_user_profile_page
Fragment to display and manage the user's profile page.
LoginActivity
Handles user login functionality including "Remember Me" feature.
MainActivity
The main activity of the application that manages the bottom navigation and loads different fragments.
MainActivityTest
 
MoodEventAdapter
Adapter for displaying a list of mood events in a RecyclerView.
MoodEventAdapter.ViewHolder
ViewHolder class for managing individual mood event items.
MoodEventDetailsFragment
A fragment that displays detailed information about a mood event, including options to edit or delete the mood event.
MoodEventFragment
A fragment that displays a list of mood events and allows searching and filtering of mood evnents
MoodEventModel
Represents a mood event with various attributes such as emotion, timestamp, emoji, color, and location data.
MoodEventModelTest
 
SignUpActivity
Activity for user registration in the app.
